report_title: Frontend Project Side Effect Scan Report
no_css_issues: No CSS side effect issues found.
no_global_var_issues: No global variable side effect issues found.
no_event_listener_issues: No event listener side effect issues found.
no_dynamic_element_issues: No dynamic element side effect issues found.
css_issue_critical_global_style: Critical global element "{{selector}}" defines styles that may cause side effects: {{declarations}}
css_issue_global_selector: Global selector "{{selector}}" may cause style pollution
css_issue_complex_selector: Selector "{{selector}}" is too complex (complexity: {{complexity}}) and may cause performance issues
css_issue_important_declaration: Property "{{property}}: {{value}}" uses !important which may cause style override issues
css_issue_duplicate_rule: Selector "{{selector}}" is defined repeatedly in the file
dynamic_issue_untracked_element: Dynamically created elements are not properly cleaned up, which may cause memory leaks
dynamic_issue_append_element: Elements dynamically added to DOM may cause memory leaks
dynamic_issue_insert_element: Elements dynamically inserted into DOM may cause memory leaks
dynamic_issue_remove_element: DOM elements dynamically removed may cause reference errors
event_issue_unremoved_listener: Event listener "{{event}}" may not be properly removed, which may cause memory leaks
event_issue_anonymous_handler: Event "{{event}}" uses an anonymous function as handler, which may be difficult to remove
event_issue_duplicate_listener: Element "{{element}}" has duplicate listeners for event "{{event}}"
event_issue_global_listener: Global event listener "{{event}}" may affect the entire application
event_issue_inline_script_listener: Event listener "{{event}}" in inline scripts is difficult to manage
event_issue_inline_handler: Inline event handler "{{event}}" is difficult to maintain
global_var_issue_declaration: Global variable "{{varName}}" may cause namespace pollution
global_var_issue_built_in_override: Global variable "{{varName}}" overrides built-in global objects, which may cause serious issues
cli_description: Frontend project side effect scanner for detecting CSS, global variables and global event listener side effects
cli_entry: Entry file path, will scan all dependencies starting from this file
cli_dir: Specify the directory to scan, will scan all files in the directory, suitable for projects with complex build configurations, directly scan the build output for most accurate results
cli_alias: Path alias configuration, format as JSON string
cli_exclude_global_selector_after_class: Exclude global selectors before specified class names
cli_unremoved_event_listener: Whether to collect unremoved event listeners
cli_anonymous_event_handler: Whether to collect anonymous event handler functions
cli_dynamic_element_append: Whether to collect dynamic element append events: appendChild
cli_dynamic_element_insert: Whether to collect dynamic element insert events: insertBefore
cli_dynamic_element_remove: Whether to collect dynamic element remove events: removeChild
cli_untracked_dynamic_element: Whether to collect other dynamic element events: createTextNode, innerHTML, outerHTML, insertAdjacentHTML
cli_global_var_declaration: Whether to collect global variable declarations
cli_built_in_override: Whether to collect built-in object overrides
cli_critical_global_style: Whether to collect risky styles for global elements
cli_complex_selector: Whether to collect complex selector style rules
cli_important_declaration: Whether to collect style rules with !important declarations
cli_duplicate_rule: Whether to collect duplicate style rules
cli_global_style_side_effect: Whether to collect high-risk CSS properties, e.g. position: fixed
cli_unsupported_file: Direct parsing of {{ext}} files is not supported, please modify the entry to a .js .jsx .tsx .ts file that consumes this style file
